if __name__ == '__main__':
    lines = int(raw_input())
    while ( lines > 0 ):
        mode = 0
        freq = 0

        numElements = int(raw_input())
        element = map(int,raw_input().split(' '))
        element.sort()
        for i in range(0, numElements):
            count = element.count(element[i])
            if ( count > freq ):
                freq = count
                mode = element[i]
        print mode,freq
        lines-=1
